name: Demon Scourge
description:
This is a fan project based on the "Souls" series. specifically, Demon's Souls. This is a sort of SNES de-make of how I imagine the First Demon Scourge took place. This uses standard and custom RTP assets and graphics and is a WIP.

Features include:

Open world/map

weather/Day/Night cycles

custom sprites, armors, weapons, and enemies

unique boss battles and a live action combat system (e.g. Link to the past)

Secret locations and items

NPCs to save and quest for

puzzles and traps

Archstone shrines-save points (mix of Bonfires, Archstones, and Sites of Grace)

several small dungeons and caves to explore

Minor storyline/lore (I have not finished the story lines in game and will be working on fleshing out the world, items, locations, and characters.

Any and all feedback is welcome and appreciated. I want to work out any bugs or issue I may have missed. Thank you
